Container.Name: owi2plex
Container.Overview:
a xml grabber for enigma with open webif
after docker start check your config folder and do your setups, setup is persistent, start from scratch by delete them
cron options are updated on docker restart. cronjob changes doesnt require a restart.
to test the cronjob functions docker exec -it <dockername> ./config/cronjob.sh
